verses.text: <> Unless the LORD builds the house, They labor in vain who build it; Unless the LORD guards the city, The watchman stays awake in vain.
Behold, children  are  a heritage from the LORD, The fruit of the womb  is  a reward.
Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, So  are  the children of oneâ€™s youth.
Happy  is  the man who has his quiver full of them; They shall not be ashamed, But shall speak with their enemies in the gate.
